description: Hive Mind configuration with FULL REASONING MODE - Coordinator decides all model selections

model_selection_mode.description: The coordinator (Opus 4.5) uses its reasoning judgment to select models for all spawned agents

capabilities: Full model selection authority for all spawned agents

model_selection_guidance.description: Guidelines for coordinator when selecting models (NOT enforced, just guidance)

use_when: Novel architecture or system design requiring deep reasoning
Cross-domain problems requiring synthesis of multiple knowledge areas
Tasks where failure cost is very high
Complex debugging requiring understanding of intricate systems

decision_factors: Task complexity and nuance (not just keywords)
Cost implications relative to task value
Whether the task requires coordinator-level reasoning
Confidence that a lower model will succeed

cost_awareness.guidance: Consider whether the task genuinely needs higher reasoning capability, or if you're choosing a more expensive model 'just to be safe'. Sonnet handles most development tasks well.

on_hive_mind_spawn.step_1: Load this configuration file for guidance
on_hive_mind_spawn.step_3: Coordinator reasons about model selection for each spawned agent
on_hive_mind_spawn.step_4: No algorithmic override - coordinator's judgment is final
